actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management

official_title: To ensure small businesses in rural America have access to credit to promote economic growth and job creation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Small Business Credit Availability Act - Amends the Commodity Exchange Act (CEA) to exclude from the meaning of financial entity any small bank, savings association, farm credit system institution, non-profit cooperative lender controlled by electric cooperatives, or credit union if the aggregate uncollateralized outward exposure plus aggregate potential outward exposure of the entity with respect to its swaps does not exceed $1 billion. (Thus exempts such entities from the clearing requirement.)

titles.title: To ensure small businesses in rural America have access to credit to promote economic growth and job creation, and for other purposes.
